author: Navdeep Srao
comment: I complained that the hands were not visible and the glow feature did not work and emailed the developer about this. With a quick reply he informed me about the bug in watchmaker and the fix for it.  Simply change your weather provider and change back, it will work perfectly then. This face was the reason I paid for the premium watchmaker app.
title: Fixed with quick response!

author: Nir Sarusy
comment: Looks very nice,  but the watchface does not appear on my phone/watch. Tried to uninstall and install few times - no good. LG G Watch R
title: Does not appear after install

author: G. Lamar Wilkie
comment: As much as I love the look of this watchface, it absolutely kills my Moto 360 battery. I was lucky to get maybe 8 hours of run time with average use. I went back to Celestial 3D, which is equally gorgeous and my watch goes all day and into the night. I may use this watchface for special occasions, but never as a daily driver.
title: Beautiful but murder on battery

author: Alex Tatistcheff
comment: The watch hands are black on a black background not white as shown in the app. Not sure why but it's unreadable.
title: Can't see time

author: Anthony Catalano
comment: Frank is the undisputed best face maker in the game.  If you've hung around the watchmaker app community you know every one is solid gold perfect every time.
title: Great Face

author: Ron Green
comment: I had lots of trouble getting this to install until I followed directions :). You have to first download the watchmaker app and then install this app from your phone (using watchmaker)
title: How to get it to work with Moto

author: Adam Payne
comment: The face is superb but could do with a bit more, my everyday watch face is vizorwatch, would say if you could do the same with Opulence this would become my everyday watch face.. Keep up the good work though.
title: Great Face, but

author: Howard Bamber
comment: Its really well done, but that's a given with Frank. The guys a genius and very generous. Most Would charge for this. Head to WatchMaker to see his best stuff.
title: Superb

author: Sean McShane
comment: Can't  see the watch on my hauwai watch. Not in the android wear app at all
title: Can't see it

author: Graham Jenkins
comment: Took me a bit to figure out how to change the second timezone but once I got that I'm really happy with it. Great design.
title: Excellent

author: Darren Faulkner
comment: Can only get black hands on Moto 360 5.1.1
title: Was great but now useless

author: Dennis Pishev
comment: I can't see it not on my phone, and not on my watch. Uninstalling.

author: Oliver Borchert
comment: Would have liked it but it just doesn't synch to my phone, tried manual and gave it an additional 10 minutes, nothing. MOTO360
title: Didn't synch with phone

author: Durga Prasad Limbu
comment: How to work it out.
title: My new watch.

author: Vitaliy I.
comment: Could not use it didn't sync with my watch just like some other reviews said
title: Did not sync with my watch

author: Izar Tarandach
comment: Like all his other creations, the author displays a keen eye for details and appreciation for esthetics.
title: Beautiful work

author: Chris Chastain
comment: Great watchface from a great designer. Also, it's unlocked so you can edit and/or learn from it.

author: Behrooz Mahmoodi
comment: Very bad not work

author: Vladan Pitel
comment: It's my daily driver since the announcement and I love it! #moto360
title: Very good!

author: Kiang Wang
comment: It let me new watch everyday.
title: Dood

author: Jupiter Bright
comment: Didn't show on my watch...
title: How do I use it?

author: BC BC
comment: Won't download

author: Bakass Auta
comment: Nice
title: Bakass bankilon

author: Israel Givol
comment: Nice and  beautiful display

author: mahmoud yousef
comment: Excellent

author: Scott Strool
comment: Building faces for Android Wear takes a lot of talent. Not only does one need to make the watchface functional, it has to inspire the wear'er. Frank continues to do so with this face and I am honored that he offered it for free to the community. The glow feature on this design is quite original and I will enjoy playing with it to get the look that I want to have. Great!

reply.author: Frank Dufaux Mindlabs
reply.content: thank you i left it unlocked so you can play with it and learn from it

title: Fine work

author: Gerry Plasky
comment: Great features and good battery life. Love the looks.  I just need to figure out how to change the 2nd  time zone and I'll be happy. Frank - you're right. I completely forgot it was there. Love this watch.

reply.author: Frank Dufaux Mindlabs
reply.content: Thank you In watchmaker setting you find it.

title: One of the best

author: Andy Kreischer
comment: Love this face. One of my favorites before so I can only imagine this new version with extra love with be even more amazing. Thank you!
title: Thanks Frank

author: Shaun Slade
comment: Installed it, tried it, loved it. The fact it's free makes it seem like stealing ;)
title: A favourite of mine.

author: Joey Salyer
comment: Frank's work is always awesome. He has some of the most amazing faces I have seen.  Top notch!
title: Brilliant as always!

author: Phil Bilton
comment: One of the best watchmaker designers out there. Amazing Watchface and the autoglow is a very nice touch and well implemented.
title: Amazing

author: Tony Price
comment: Great job Frank, looks good on my Urbane. You are one of the best bud.
title: Top Notch

author: Ryan Mc Allister
comment: I really like that you can change the color on the fly right from the watchface. Great job!
title: Great watchface

author: Clint Townshend
comment: Have just downloaded a couple of these watches and they look great!
title: Great Design!

author: alexander ekin
comment: Love it so much. Thank You Frank
title: Cool Watch Face

author: Peter Boyd
comment: Certainly one of the best of the year. Thank you!
title: Clear clean

author: Neill Lew
comment: So clear and sharp looks awesome in my LG GWR .
title: Loving it .

author: Ian Bowers
comment: Opulence watches are always a good ride. Loving this one.
title: Loving it

author: Timothy Ursch
comment: Wonderful design by a masterful watch face creator.

author: Ryan Wallis
comment: One of my favorites!
title: Very nice!
